meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>cabinet</kanji> <kanji>colleague</kanji>s are the <vocabulary>cabinet ministers</vocabulary>. They're the people in the Cabinet that are all colleagues with each other. They just happen to be known as ministers.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
